 1990-08761990-05-150,  ,  ,  COM
PrecisRequest the Auditor General of Canada to audit the CBC Pension Board of Trustees and each of its subsidiary companies, the Corporations's Newsworld channel and Employee Assistance Program and to issue his audit reports to the CBC Pension Board of Trustees (for the CBC Pension Board of Trustees and each of its subsidiary companies) and to the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation (for the Newsworld channel and the Employee Assistance Program).
Attachments
